			function monsterinsights_add_bloom_forms_ids() {
				var bloom_forms = document.querySelectorAll('.et_bloom_form_content form');
				if (bloom_forms.length > 0) {
					for (var i = 0; i < bloom_forms.length; i++) {
						if ('' === bloom_forms[i].id) {
							var form_parent_root = monsterinsights_find_parent_with_class(bloom_forms[i], 'et_bloom_optin');
							if (form_parent_root) {
								var classes = form_parent_root.className.split(' ');
								for (var j = 0; j < classes.length; ++j) {
									if (0 === classes[j].indexOf('et_bloom_optin')) {
										bloom_forms[i].id = classes[j];

								}

			function monsterinsights_find_parent_with_class(element, className) {
				if (element.parentNode && '' !== className) {
					if (element.parentNode.className.indexOf(className) >= 0) {

					} else {
						return monsterinsights_find_parent_with_class(element.parentNode, className);
					}
				}
				return false;

 <script data-cfasync=false data-wpfc-render=false>var monsterinsights_tracked_video_marks = {};
			var monsterinsights_youtube_percentage_tracking_timeouts = {};
			/* Works for YouTube and Vimeo */
			function monsterinsights_media_get_id_for_iframe( source, service ) {
				var iframeUrlParts = source.split('?');
				var stripedUrl = iframeUrlParts[0].split('/');
				var videoId = stripedUrl[ stripedUrl.length - 1 ];

			function monsterinsights_media_record_video_event( provider, event, label, parameters = {} ) {

					event_label: label,
					non_interaction: event === 'impression',
					...parameters

			function monsterinsights_media_maybe_record_video_progress( provider, label, videoId, videoParameters ) {
				var progressTrackingAllowedMarks = [10,25,50,75];
				if ( typeof monsterinsights_tracked_video_marks[ videoId ] == 'undefined' ) {
					monsterinsights_tracked_video_marks[ videoId ] = [];
				}
				var { video_percent } = videoParameters;
				if ( progressTrackingAllowedMarks.includes( video_percent ) && !monsterinsights_tracked_video_marks[ videoId ].includes( video_percent ) ) {
					monsterinsights_media_record_video_event( provider, 'video_progress', label, videoParameters );
					/* Prevent multiple records for the same percentage */
					monsterinsights_tracked_video_marks[ videoId ].push( video_percent );
				}
			}
			/* --- Vimeo --- */
            var monsterinsights_media_vimeo_plays = {};
            function monsterinsights_setup_vimeo_events_for_iframe(iframe, title, player) {
                var playerId = iframe.getAttribute('id');
                var videoLabel = title || iframe.title || iframe.getAttribute('src');
                if ( !playerId ) {
                    playerId = monsterinsights_media_get_id_for_iframe( iframe.getAttribute('src'), 'vimeo' );
                    iframe.setAttribute( 'id', playerId );
                }
                monsterinsights_media_vimeo_plays[playerId] = 0;
                var videoParameters = {
                    video_provider: 'vimeo',
                    video_title: title,
                    video_url: iframe.getAttribute('src')
                };
                /**
                 * Record Impression
                 **/
                monsterinsights_media_record_video_event( 'vimeo', 'impression', videoLabel, videoParameters );
                /**
                 * Record video start
                 **/
                player.on('play', function(data) {
                    let playerId = this.element.id;
                    if ( monsterinsights_media_vimeo_plays[playerId] === 0 ) {
                        monsterinsights_media_vimeo_plays[playerId]++;
                        videoParameters.video_duration = data.duration;
                        videoParameters.video_current_time = data.seconds;
                        videoParameters.video_percent = 0;
                        monsterinsights_media_record_video_event( 'vimeo', 'video_start', videoLabel, videoParameters );
                    }
                });
                /**
                 * Record video progress
                 **/
                player.on('timeupdate', function(data) {
                    var progress = Math.floor(data.percent * 100);
                    videoParameters.video_duration = data.duration;
                    videoParameters.video_current_time = data.seconds;
                    videoParameters.video_percent = progress;
                    monsterinsights_media_maybe_record_video_progress( 'vimeo', videoLabel, playerId, videoParameters );
                });
                /**
                 * Record video complete
                 **/
                player.on('ended', function(data) {
                    videoParameters.video_duration = data.duration;
                    videoParameters.video_current_time = data.seconds;
                    videoParameters.video_percent = 100;
                    monsterinsights_media_record_video_event( 'vimeo', 'video_complete', videoLabel, videoParameters );
                });
            }
			function monsterinsights_on_vimeo_load() {
				var vimeoIframes = document.querySelectorAll("iframe[src*='vimeo']");
				vimeoIframes.forEach(function( iframe ) {
                    //  Set up the player
					var player = new Vimeo.Player(iframe);
                    //  The getVideoTitle function returns a promise
                    player.getVideoTitle().then(function(title) {
                        /*
                         * Binding the events inside this callback guarantees that we
                         * always have the correct title for the video
                         */
                        monsterinsights_setup_vimeo_events_for_iframe(iframe, title, player)
                    });

			}
			function monsterinsights_media_init_vimeo_events() {

				if ( vimeoIframes.length ) {
					/* Maybe load Vimeo API */
					if ( window.Vimeo === undefined ) {
						var tag = document.createElement("script");

			/* --- YouTube --- */
			function monsterinsights_media_on_youtube_load() {
				var monsterinsights_media_youtube_plays = {};
				function __onPlayerReady(event) {

				 * Record progress callback

				function __track_youtube_video_progress( player, videoLabel, videoParameters ) {

					var currentTime = playerInfo.currentTime; /* player.getCurrentTime(); */

					videoParameters.video_current_time = currentTime;

						clearInterval( monsterinsights_youtube_percentage_tracking_timeouts[ playerId ] );
					}

				youtubeIframes.forEach(function( iframe ) {
					var playerId = iframe.getAttribute('id');
					if ( !playerId ) {

					new YT.Player(playerId, {
						events: {

							onStateChange: __youtube_on_state_change

			function monsterinsights_media_load_youtube_api() {
				if ( window.YT ) {

				var youtubeIframes = document.querySelectorAll("iframe[src*='youtube'],iframe[src*='youtu.be']");
				if ( 0 === youtubeIframes.length ) {

			/* --- HTML Videos --- */
			function monsterinsights_media_init_html_video_events() {
				var monsterinsights_media_html_plays = {};
				var videos = document.querySelectorAll('video');
				var videosCount = 0;
				videos.forEach(function( video ) {

					if ( !videoLabel ) {
						var videoCaptionEl = video.nextElementSibling;
						if ( videoCaptionEl && videoCaptionEl.nodeName.toLowerCase() === 'figcaption' ) {

						} else {

					if ( !playerId ) {

						video.setAttribute('id', playerId);
					}
					monsterinsights_media_html_plays[playerId] = 0
					var videoSrc = video.getAttribute('src')
					if ( ! videoSrc && video.currentSrc ) {

					var videoParameters = {
						video_provider: 'html',

							videoParameters.video_current_time = video.currentTime;

						videoParameters.video_percent = progress;

					/**

class=vc_column-inner ><div
class=wpb_wrapper><div
class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element " ><div
class=wpb_wrapper><h4>Classroom Training Program</h4><p>Our classroom-training curriculum is customized for each client, with individual workflows defined for a personalized approach for each EHR. We have a unique methodology, catering to particular user groups, and ensuring an enhanced learning experience. Our training experts can staff or supplement all of your training needs.</p><h4>One-On-One Training Program</h4><p>We understand the importance of onsite user and provider training to ensure full adoption of the EHR and support IT software, during the implementation process. Our One-On-One training is focused specifically on the clinical workflows and creates a better user adoption rate as users can use the new system while working in a typical clinic environment.</p><h4>Virtual Training Program</h4><p>Our Virtual Training Program offers both an extensive library of customized training videos, as well as virtual/ online instructor-led classes.</p><h4>e-Learning Program</h4><p>We create custom online e-Learning Center customized to the organization’s specific needs. That gives users flexible on when they can attend training and allows them to work at their pace ensuring they have a good understanding of the new EHR or IT system software. Completion of the e-Learning Program also includes testing and analytics.</p><h4>Train the Trainer</h4><p>We train your organization’s EHR/IT support staff to prepare them to tackle any support and training needs. Whether it is a new implementation, upgrade or a conversion, we guarantee your team is completely proficient.</p></div></div></div></div></div><div
class="vc_col-sm-6 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col no-extra-padding inherit_tablet inherit_phone "  data-padding-pos=all data-has-bg-color=false data-bg-color data-bg-opacity=1 data-animation data-delay=0 ><div
class=vc_column-inner ><div
class=wpb_wrapper><div
class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element " ><div
class=wpb_wrapper><h4>Instructional Curriculum</h4><p>Customized documentation and instructional materials customized to the organization’s specific training needs, workflows, and the to organizations specific EHR or IT systems. Our materials include Reference Guides, Job Aids, Tri-Folds and Customized Training Guides for users.</p><h4>Organizational Implementation Planning</h4><p>Our team of subject matter experts has traveled to many clients nationwide and has seen what works well, and we integrate those items in our implementation planning. We start by mapping our the current state of the organization and projected future states. We conduct clinical readiness assessments, build an EHR implementation project plan, and put together a strategy for when contingencies arise.</p><h4>Training and Go-Live Support Strategy</h4><p>We have a proven and effective go live process plan from start to finish. Our staff begins with a discovery phase where we learn about your organization, current pain points, all EHR or other systems that will be involved and workflow needs surrounding them. Our workflow analysis is a depth system of your users and clinical process. Our experts come onsite review and create a system design and training plan. Our staff will complete application design/build, full system testing, conduct classroom and on the job training and go-live support</p><h4>Full EHR Optimization Services</h4><p>You can learn more about our Optimization services by visiting our Optimization page.</p></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div

data.text:
Training & Implementation Services
As healthcare technology evolves, so should your team’s proficiency. Our experts provide exceptional training and implementation support designed explicitly for EHR systems. We educate users, establish best practices, and create healthy system habits early on, empowering them to leverage the full potential of your EHR and PM systems for optimal patient care and improved operational efficiency.
[Home](http://ehrconcepts.com/) > [Healthcare IT](http://ehrconcepts.com/healthcare_it/) > Training & Implementation
Classroom Training Program
Our classroom-training curriculum is customized for each client, with individual workflows defined for a personalized approach for each EHR. We have a unique methodology, catering to particular user groups, and ensuring an enhanced learning experience. Our training experts can staff or supplement all of your training needs.
One-On-One Training Program
We understand the importance of onsite user and provider training to ensure full adoption of the EHR and support IT software, during the implementation process. Our One-On-One training is focused specifically on the clinical workflows and creates a better user adoption rate as users can use the new system while working in a typical clinic environment.
Virtual Training Program
Our Virtual Training Program offers both an extensive library of customized training videos, as well as virtual/ online instructor-led classes.
e-Learning Program
We create custom online e-Learning Center customized to the organization’s specific needs. That gives users flexible on when they can attend training and allows them to work at their pace ensuring they have a good understanding of the new EHR or IT system software. Completion of the e-Learning Program also includes testing and analytics.
Train the Trainer
We train your organization’s EHR/IT support staff to prepare them to tackle any support and training needs. Whether it is a new implementation, upgrade or a conversion, we guarantee your team is completely proficient.
Instructional Curriculum
Customized documentation and instructional materials customized to the organization’s specific training needs, workflows, and the to organizations specific EHR or IT systems. Our materials include Reference Guides, Job Aids, Tri-Folds and Customized Training Guides for users.
Organizational Implementation Planning
Our team of subject matter experts has traveled to many clients nationwide and has seen what works well, and we integrate those items in our implementation planning. We start by mapping our the current state of the organization and projected future states. We conduct clinical readiness assessments, build an EHR implementation project plan, and put together a strategy for when contingencies arise.
Training and Go-Live Support Strategy
We have a proven and effective go live process plan from start to finish. Our staff begins with a discovery phase where we learn about your organization, current pain points, all EHR or other systems that will be involved and workflow needs surrounding them. Our workflow analysis is a depth system of your users and clinical process. Our experts come onsite review and create a system design and training plan. Our staff will complete application design/build, full system testing, conduct classroom and on the job training and go-live support
Full EHR Optimization Services
You can learn more about our Optimization services by visiting our Optimization page.
Services & Consulting at it's Finest!
We set the industry standards for information technology. Our team consists of elite IT professionals worldwide.
Let's get together, discuss your next project, or just get some coffee.
Call us at 888.674.0999 or email us at [info@ehrconcepts.com](mailto:info@ehrconcepts.com).
EHR & PM Help Desk Support 24/7
Our Healthcare Triple Down Support Helpdesk Solution is a simplified, efficient & effective support system that is changing organizations nationwide!
